note_content.History of Present Illness: Patient reports flare-ups mainly during winter months. Itching and irritation increase with skin dryness.
note_content.Past Medical History: Eczema diagnosed five years ago. No other chronic diseases reported.
note_content.Family History: Michael's mother has a history of psoriasis.
note_content.Social History: Michael is a graphic designer, works mostly indoors, non-smoker, occasionally drinks alcohol.
note_content.Physical Examination: Dry, red patches observed on the palms and fingers, slight skin cracking without bleeding.

Assessment and Plan.Plan:
路 Continue to use hydrocortisone cream.
路 Recommended daily use of a moisturizer.
路 Advised to wear non-latex gloves during cold weather.
路 Follow-up in 4 weeks to reassess skin condition.
